mapper.select:
SELECT /* mstMbr.getMstMbrListCount */ COUNT(MBR_NO) AS CNT FROM MST_MBR
AND MBR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{mbrNm}, ' ', ''), '%')
AND REPLACE(CONCAT(TEL_NO1, TEL_NO2, TEL_NO3), '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{telNo}, '%')
AND JUMIN_NO1 = #{juminNo1}

SELECT /* mstMbr.getMstMbr */ MM.MBR_NO , MM.MBR_NM , MM.GEND_CD , MM.AGE , MM.JUMIN_NO1 , MM.FRG_CD , MM.TEL_NO1 , MM.TEL_NO2 , MM.TEL_NO3 , MM.JOB_CD , MM.ZIP_CD , MM.ADDR1 , MM.ADDR2 , MM.MBR_TP_CD , MM.DRG_USE_CD , MM.MRG_CD , MM.EDU_CD , MM.RLGN_CD , MM.REQ_PATH_CD , MM.MEDIC_CARE_CD , MM.DIS_ETC , MM.REG_USR_ID , MM.REG_DT , MM.STP_DT , MM.FMLY_RMK , MM.RMK , MM.MNG_USR_ID , MM.LST_UPD_ID , MM.LST_UPD_DT , MM.STS_CD , MM.CRE_ID , MM.CRE_DT , MM.UPD_DT , MM.UPD_ID , SU.USR_NM AS UPD_NM FROM MST_MBR MM LEFT JOIN SYS_USR SU ON (MM.UPD_ID = SU.USR_ID AND SU.USE_YN = 'Y') WHERE MM.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}

SELECT /* mstMbr.getMbrNoSeq */ CONCAT('M', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H'), LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTR(MBR_NO, 12) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 4, '0')) AS newMbrNo FROM MST_MBR WHERE MBR_NO LIKE CONCAT('M', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H'), '%')
mapper.delete: DELETE /* mstMbr.deleteMstMbr */ FROM MST_MBR WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}
